title: Youth Communities and Youth-at-risk in Singapore
description: In this module, we will take on an interdisciplinary lens in understanding the needs, strengths and challenges of youths and youths-at-risk in Singapore, as well as the ecosystems they are embedded in. We will explore topics such as youth culture, youth mental health, risk and resilience in youth, youth voice and activism, among others. Importantly, we will examine how our deepened understanding of youth communities can inform our meaningful engagement with them.
department: College of Alice and Peter Tan
